name: Zombies 'N' Marshmallows
description:
Fight the zombies with marshmallows, the most white and squishy weapon there is!

This game was made in 72 hours by one person (me), don't expect too much and you'll be having fun in no time!

Ludum dare page:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=p...

Also playable in WebGL form here: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3287242/Ludum%20Dare%2032/WebGL/index.html
